# SEQ01 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 1 focuses on regions instead of countries

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl001

## Emergent Phenomena
Autonomous regions that can govern themselves and maintain their unique cultural identity

## Overview
This sequence contains 1 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
